de.payleven.payment

Class PaylevenFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.payleven.payment.PaylevenFactory

  • public final class PaylevenFactory
extends Object
    Produces Payleven instance which is authorized and configured to make payments.

    • Method Summary

      Creates Payleven instance, specific for the provided credentials.

    • Method Detail

      • registerAndWait

        public static Payleven registerAndWait(Context context,
                       String userName,
                       String password,
                       String apiKey)
        Creates Payleven instance, specific for the provided credentials. It is recommended to use only one instance of Payleven. All subsequent calls to this method will return the same instance but configured with the specified credentials. This is a synchronous call and must be called on the background thread. This method won't work if called from an AsyncTask which uses the default executor. If you still want to use an AsyncTask, make sure you perform it on a separate executor. For example myAsyncTask..executeOnExecutor(AsyncTask.THREAD_POOL_EXECUTOR);
        Parameters:
        context - android context. Application context will be used internally
        userName - userName registered with payleven
        password - password received from payleven
        apiKey - key received from payleven
        Returns:
        Initialized object
        Throws:
        NetworkError - error in case of network communication problem
        ConfigurationError - in case of incorrect credentials
        PaylevenError - an unexpected error. This is also a superclass of all other Payleven errors, so you may want to only handle this error which indicates that some kind of error has occurred

      • registerAsync

        public static void registerAsync(Context context,
                 String userName,
                 String password,
                 String apiKey,
                 PaylevenRegistrationListener listener)
        Starts registration asynchronously the result of the registration will be propagated through listener. It is recommended to use only one instance of Payleven. All subsequent calls to this method will return the same instance but configured with the specified credentials.
        Parameters:
        context - android context. Application context will be used internally
        userName - userName registered with payleven
        password - password received from payleven
        apiKey - key received from payleven
        listener - reacts on the result of the registration process
